name: Touhou Mystery Reel
description:
A ray of light fell from the sky, and mysterious buildings suddenly rose around. The mysterious scroll appeared in Gensokyo. As the number one idler, Cirno decided to see what happened.

There will be various side missions in the levels, and the plot trend will be slightly changed according to the completion of the missions.

Battle system:

This is an action game, there will be frequent knife block in the game, find the right time to attack!
